title: Saihate no Paladin
synopsis: Born into a new world after a life of stagnancy, Will awakens to the faces of a skeleton, a ghost, and a mummy. Living in the ruins of a city long fallen, the three raise Will as their own. The skeleton— Blood—teaches him to fight; the ghost—Gus—teaches him magic; and the mummy—Mary—teaches him religion and responsibility. Most importantly, they all teach him love.
voices: ['Kawase, Maki', 'Horie, Yui', 'Konishi, Katsuyuki', 'Tobita, Nobuo', 'Yuuki, Aoi', 'Murase, Ayumu', 'Takahashi, Hiroki', 'Yusa, Kouji', 'Suzuki, Eri']
staff: [['Nobuta, Yuu', ['Director']], ['Yanagi, Nagi', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['H-el-ical//', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Takahashi, Tatsuya', ['Series Composition']]]
